mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington Parke Custis to J[ ] Pickett Esq., 1857 April 17
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Custis, George Washington Parke, 1781-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:description: George Washington Parke Custis writes from Arlington House and explains that he receives large amounts of correspondence re: GWashington ... "cutting up fragments from old letters & accounts some of 1760, or nearly an hundred years ago, to supply the call for Anything ... of his venerated hands" ... encloses a 1772 account with GW autograph as a relic for the Tri Mont Society] .... Autograph letter signed, 2 pages. Name on original manuscript appears as "George W. P. Custis"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799
Relics
